root.name: TV Show King Party
root.description: OverviewTV Show King Party is a trivia game developed by Gameloft and published by Ubisoft Entertainment for the Wii platform.GameplayTV Show King is set up like a trivia TV show. Up to four players can play on the same console. In the main game mode there are several steps to go through to begin playing. The first step is to choose the number of players. Any number of players between 1 and 4 with active Wii Remotes can join. After choosing the number of players to participate, each player will choose a Mii to use as their in-game character.Each game will allow players to choose the number of rounds it will last and the starting difficulty of the questions. The questions in the game will get easier if many are guessed incorrectly, and wil get more difficult if answers are being answered correctly.
